data.actual_result: The Change Log modal goes outside of the viewport, making both the (X) and previous change logs link unclickable.
data.expected_result: The Change Log modal should be contained within the viewport, such that the (X) is clickable and the "Missed an update? Check out our previous change logs" message is visible.
data.short_description: Change Log modal height goes beyond viewport height
data.steps_to_repro: - Log into Discord to view the Change Log - Alternatively, right click the User Settings gear and select Change Log from the menu - Alternatively, open User Settings and click on Change Log
